topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: DocBook

name: Literate UI Generation Technology
short_description: This technology provides ability to generate User Interface (UI) from its documentation in DocBook format. The ideas of literate programming were taken at the heart of whole project. XSLT is used to perform transformation from DocBook into UI.
